customer_name: FLYING PIGS PETTING ZOO & PONY RIDES
site_name: FLYING PIGS PETTING ZOO & PONY RIDES

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
I called the licensee and honked the horn. The number did not allow you to leave a message so I texted them. After
waiting about 30 minutes, I called again without being able to leave a message. I texted the licensee again letting them
know I was leaving the premises. A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the
inspection process at 11:00 am on 6-July-2022.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
I called the licensee and honked the horn. The number did not allow you to leave a message so I texted them. After 
waiting about 30 minutes, I called again without being able to leave a message. I texted the licensee again letting them 
know I was leaving the premises. A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the 
inspection process at 11:00 am on 6-July-2022. 
 
 
 
End Section
